input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

dataset_name.description: The name of this dataset, used in output files and within visualisations

samplesheet.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

large_temp_dir.description: This script can download and create large files. Specify a scratch directory with at least ~3TB free space.

publish_dir_mode.description: How to copy output from the work directory to the output directory

mod_caller.description: The method used to call the RNA modification. Options: dorado. m6Anet support is coming soon!

differential_model.description: The model to use to call differentially modified sites, as a comma-separated list. Options: homo_norm, hetero_norm, binomial, beta_binomial

min_reads.description: Minimum reads needed at a site (across all samples) to be called

prob_threshold.description: Minimum probability detected at a site to be called
